attributes.action: honour Bobby Moore with a posthumous knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With other members of the 1966 World Cup winning team having been knighted since his death, it is unbelieveable that Bobby Moore has not been honoured similarly. No England captain has ever equalled his success on the pitch, and no England player has ever set a better example of how the beautiful game should be played.

rejection.details: Sorry, the PM has no powers to offer or award posthumous knighthoods, however worthy the cause
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
